attachments.fallback: [February 7th, 2021 8:05 AM] mohamed82008: I am trying to plot the pdf of a distribution using `StatsPlots` but I can’t increase the thickness of the line. `linewidth` and `lw` don’t work. It seems `lw` should (<https://docs.juliaplots.org/latest/tutorial/#Using-a-Type-Recipe>). Can someone reproduce this?
